message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, valued at $1,200,000 to you. Considering its quality and uniqueness, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,350,000. This represents a significant value proposition, allowing you to acquire this product at a price that is 12.5% above its intrinsic worth to you, while ensuring a fair return for us. I believe this offer strikes the right balance between maximizing the value for you and ensuring a profitable transaction for us. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
